mapper.select: SELECT FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID, FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT SEQ, FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID,FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID, FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT F.FAQ_ID, F.FAQ_TYPE_ID, T.FAQ_TYPE_NAME, F.FAQ_Q, F.FAQ_A FROM FAQ F INNER JOIN FAQ_TYPE T ON F.FAQ_TYPE_ID = T.FAQ_TYPE_ID ORDER BY FAQ_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
SELECT F.FAQ_ID, F.FAQ_TYPE_ID, T.FAQ_TYPE_NAME, F.FAQ_Q, F.FAQ_A FROM FAQ F INNER JOIN FAQ_TYPE T ON F.FAQ_TYPE_ID = T.FAQ_TYPE_ID WHERE F.FAQ_ID=#{faqId}

SELECT FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID, FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT SEQ, FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID,FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, FAQ_ID, FAQ_TYPE_ID, FAQ_TYPE_NAME, FAQ_Q, FAQ_A FROM (SELECT F.FAQ_ID, F.FAQ_TYPE_ID, T.FAQ_TYPE_NAME, F.FAQ_Q, F.FAQ_A FROM FAQ F INNER JOIN FAQ_TYPE T ON F.FAQ_TYPE_ID = T.FAQ_TYPE_ID WHERE F.FAQ_TYPE_ID=#{searchDTO.theme} ORDER BY FAQ_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
